lines.i: The external data object to be linked to the selected document e.g. a path to a fileserver, and a filename for the object (VA1$:[IMAGES]JR042696.BMP, or i:\images\jr042696.bmp), etc.

ol.li:
Contains exactly one [1..1] uri with data type String
The path to a fileserver, and a filename for the object (VA1$:[IMAGES]JR042696.BMP, or i:\images\jr042696.bmp), etc.
